channel.title: Anyone ever try making a Japanese electronic style song
channel.description:
About a few months ago, I discovered this guy named Camellia, and he is quite the artist, making multiple subgenres like hardcore, trance, dubstep, speedcore and a lot more.
Then I found t+pazolite, who's just crazy with his songs, and with those two discovered, I tried making a song based off theirs.
Spoiler: It ended up pretty bad :joy:
But anyways, has anyone ever tried doing a Japanese style?
[spoiler]There's a lot of TouHou remixes, there too, also tried to recreate, ended up needing a 3/4 time signature :')[/spoiler]
There's a reason why this is in the random category

item.title: Anyone ever try making a Japanese electronic style song
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
i wouldn’t say most. There’s def a handful that are in a similar style, but most are actually tracks that can fit on a sheet of music without looking like a black square.

And i’ve seen that vid before (and i’ve watched a lot of black midi in my life). The touhou black midi’s in that aren’t the actual tracks. There usually is piano, but the whole track usually isn’t all piano.

Example: the actual track that was shown as a black midi from touhou:

https://www.youtube.com/embed/195XntreoMc

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone ever try making a Japanese electronic style song

item.title: Anyone ever try making a Japanese electronic style song
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
That’s also kinda ignoring the fact that most TouHou games, and bullet hell games in general, are black midi tracks.

https://www.youtube.com/embed/FqjSYtKWyX8

Which, for the record, tends to just sound sorta like my epic mixes I did back in the day.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone ever try making a Japanese electronic style song
item.dc:creator: RazerFireRiot
item.description:
I mean, I’m trying to remake t+pazolite’s Garakuta Doll Play in FL Studio, which is pretty easy, but I haven’t heard of any signature changes in any of his songs (yet).
Most the song’s I’ve listened to are TouHou remixes in 4/4, but when I tried to remake U.N. Owen Was Her?, the appregio part at the beginning were a 3/4, but speaking of @NotMiles’s triplet thing, I found it pretty confusing to do actually.

But who knows? We might unironically have a Japanese producer walk in the community!

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone ever try making a Japanese electronic style song
